gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Clippers 125, Trail Blazers 117
gameRecap.excerpt: The Clippers defeated the Trail Blazers, 125-117. Paul George recorded 31 points (4-8 3PM), four rebounds, and three assists for the Clippers, with Kawhi Leonard adding 22 points, six rebounds, three assists in the victory. Scoot Henderson tallied 24 points, 10 assists, and four rebounds for the Trail Blazers in the losing effort. The Clippers improve to 44-25, while the Trail Blazers fall to 19-51.
